title: Protest at CID for Johnston’s arrest
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A group is currently engaged in a protest opposite the Criminal Investigations Department, demanding the arrest of former Minister Johnston Fernando.
The group arrived from GotaGoGama, a protest site demanding the resignation of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
Former Minister Johnston Fernando was summoned to the CID today (24) to provide a statement regarding the recent attacks on MynaGoGama and GotaGoGama.
Ukraine’s Zelenskiy says he would meet with Putin to end the war
Amber alert issued for heavy showers, strong winds & rough seas
